method.text: Wash lettuce leaves and dry in a salad spinner. Tear the leaves into large pieces. Place in a salad bowl.
Heat the olive oil in a frying pan until moderately hot. Cut bread into small cubes. Fry bread cubes in the hot oil until crisp and golden. Remove with a slotted spoon. Drain on kitchen paper.
Chop the anchovies into tiny pieces.

Place the eggs in a pan of cold water. Bring to the boil. Reduce to a simmer and cook for 2 min. Blend the remaining dressing ingredients in a food processor or blender until well combined. Break in the soft boiled eggs and blend again until the dressing is creamy. Adjust seasoning if necessary.
Pour the dressing over the lettuce leaves. Sprinkle with the Parmesan flakes and anchovy pieces. Scatter over the croutons. Grind some black paper over the salad. Toss the salad and serve.
